alert.note: Alert for Early (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 01 at 2:45PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN HOUSTON...NORTHERN JACKSON AND SOUTHWESTERN EARLY COUNTIES THROUGH 330 PM EST/230 PM CST/... At 245 PM EST/145 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cottonwood to 6 miles east of Graceville to 7 miles northeast of Chipley. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cottonwood, Graceville, Dothan, Ashford, Cowarts, Centerville, Malone, Rehobeth, Cottondale, Greenwood, Avon, Madrid, Gordon, Campbellton, Jakin, Bascom, Memphis, Richter Crossroads, Saffold, and Pansey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
